tool_description: Not just a simple URL shortener, but one with fantastic enhancements
title: AlleTips URL shortener

api_list.name: Get list of existing links
api_list.description: Returns a list of all short links you created within the defined parameters.

optional_parameters.name: created
optional_parameters.description: Shows links that were created at or after this date

optional_parameters.name: inactive
optional_parameters.description: Shows also deactivated links

api_list.name: Create a QR code for a short link
api_list.description:
Creates a QR (quick response) code for a specific shortlink.
Returns the download url.

required_parameters.name: link
required_parameters.description: The shortlink you want to create a QR code for (without https://)

optional_parameters.name: fg
optional_parameters.description:
Hex-Code for the foreground color.
Default: #000000 (black)

optional_parameters.name: shape
optional_parameters.description:
Defines the form of the QR dots.
Default: Square

optional_parameters.name: bg
optional_parameters.description:
Hex-Code for the background color.
Default: #FFFFFF (white)

api_list.name: Get click counts per shortlink
api_list.description: Returns a list of your links and the individual click count.

optional_parameters.name: campaignid
optional_parameters.description: Limits the results to all links within this campaign.

optional_parameters.name: enddate
optional_parameters.description: Limits results to links with a enddate lesser or equal to the specified one.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description:
Orders the shortlinks by creation date.
(asc = ascending, desc = descending)

optional_parameters.name: startdate
optional_parameters.description: Limits results to links with a startdate greater or equal to the specified one.

optional_parameters.name: domain
optional_parameters.description: Limits results to a specific domain (e.g. alle.tips)

optional_parameters.name: inactive
optional_parameters.description: Returns also stats for inactive links.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limits the number of returned stats.

api_list.name: Get click history for campaign
api_list.description:
Returns the number of clicks (total, link clicks and QR-clicks) for a specific campaign.
Additionally an array with chart data will be returned (x: date, y: total clicks).

required_parameters.name: campaignid
required_parameters.description: Limits the results to a specific campaign.

optional_parameters.name: startdate
optional_parameters.description: Returns events at and after this date.

optional_parameters.name: enddate
optional_parameters.description: Returns events at and before this date.

optional_parameters.name: link
optional_parameters.description: Returns values for a specific link.

api_list.name: Get number of active links
api_list.description: Returns the number of active links for your accounts.

api_list.name: Get click history
api_list.description:
Returns the number of clicks (total, link clicks and QR-clicks).
Additionally an array with chart data will be returned (x: date, y: total clicks).

optional_parameters.name: enddate
optional_parameters.description: Returns events at and before this date.

optional_parameters.name: link
optional_parameters.description: Returns values for a specific link.

optional_parameters.name: startdate
optional_parameters.description: Returns events at and after this date.

optional_parameters.name: campaignid
optional_parameters.description: Limits the results to a specific campaign.

api_list.name: Retrieve QR code for a shortlink
api_list.description:
Retrieve a QR (quick response) code for your shortlink.
Scans of this code will be counted as regular clicks, but also reported separately.

required_parameters.name: link
required_parameters.description: Your shortlink to be QRed (without https:// etc.)

api_list.name: Update your campaign
api_list.description: Edits values of a specific campaign

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: The name of your campaign

optional_parameters.name: startdate
optional_parameters.description: Defines your campaign's start date.

optional_parameters.name: enddate
optional_parameters.description: Defines your campaign's enddate.

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: An internal description about what your campaign is about.

api_list.name: Create a new campaign
api_list.description:
Creates a new campaign you can assign links to.
Returns the campaign-ID.

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: An explanation what your campaign is about - just internal.

optional_parameters.name: startdate
optional_parameters.description: Defines a start date for your campaign

optional_parameters.name: enddate
optional_parameters.description: Defines an enddate for your campaign

api_list.name: Delete a campaign
api_list.description:
Deletes an existing campaign. All included links stay active!
Only the assignment link <-> campaign gets deleted as well.

api_list.name: Get list of existing campaigns
api_list.description: Returns a list of all your campaigns (= groups of links).

optional_parameters.name: nocampaign
optional_parameters.description: Returns also a summary of the shortlinks that haven't been assigned to a campaign.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Get all campaigns thats title includes [name]

optional_parameters.name: startdate
optional_parameters.description: Shows all campaigns with a startdate greater or equal this date.

optional_parameters.name: enddate
optional_parameters.description: Shows all campaigns with an enddate greater or equal this date (and an earlier startdate).

optional_parameters.name: inactive
optional_parameters.description:
Returns also inactive campaigns.
Default: only active ones.

optional_parameters.name: campaignid
optional_parameters.description: Get all infos for this specific campaign

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limits the number of results

api_list.name: Update an existing short link
api_list.description:
Edits a previously created short link.
([domain] AND [link]) OR [shortlink] is required!

You can edit various elements, but you cannot change the domain name or the short link itself. In case you made a mistake, please delete the old one and create a new shortlink.

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: Internal description what the link is about - just for you!
optional_parameters.default: Just an internal description of your link

optional_parameters.name: campaignid
optional_parameters.description:
Assign the short link to a certain campaign.
Campaign-IDs can be retrieved via GET /campaign/

optional_parameters.name: startdate
optional_parameters.description: Defines the date the link is active from.

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: The URL to be shortened

optional_parameters.name: link
optional_parameters.description: The complete short link to be edited

optional_parameters.name: enddate
optional_parameters.description: Defines the date until the link is active .

optional_parameters.name: active
optional_parameters.description: Activates or deactivates a short link

api_list.name: Delete a short link
api_list.description:
Deletes a short link you created previously.
**([link] AND [domain]) OR [url] is required!**

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: The complete short link

optional_parameters.name: domain
optional_parameters.description: The domain part of the short url, everything before the slash (/), e.g. **alle.tips**/rapidapi

optional_parameters.name: link
optional_parameters.description: The part of the short url after the slash (/), e.g. alle.tips/**rapidapi**

api_list.name: Sign-On for RapidAPI
api_list.description:
In order to use this API properly you need to sign on.
Creates and returns your public key.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://alletips-url-shortener.p.rapidapi.com/rapidsignup/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "alletips-url-shortener.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get list of available domains
api_list.description: Returns a list of domains you can use to shorten your urls.

optional_parameters.name: favorite
optional_parameters.description: Show default domain for this/your account

api_list.name: Create a new short link
api_list.description: Shortens your url to a more convenient shorter version

optional_parameters.name: domain
optional_parameters.description:
Defines the domain name to be used for the shortening.
Get a list of available domain names via GET /domains/
Default: alle.tips

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: Just an internal description just for you...

optional_parameters.name: link
optional_parameters.description:
The desired shorted version: [domain]/[link]
e.g. **alle.tips/rapidapi**

api_list.name: Create a QR code for a short link
api_list.description:
Creates a QR (quick response) code for a specific shortlink.
Returns the download url.

required_parameters.name: link
required_parameters.description: The shortlink you want to create a QR code for (without https://)

optional_parameters.name: fg
optional_parameters.description:
Hex-Code for the foreground color.
Default: #000000 (black)

optional_parameters.name: shape
optional_parameters.description:
Defines the form of the QR dots.
Default: Square

optional_parameters.name: bg
optional_parameters.description:
Hex-Code for the background color.
Default: #FFFFFF (white)

api_list.name: Create a new campaign
api_list.description:
Creates a new campaign you can assign links to.
Returns the campaign-ID.

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: An explanation what your campaign is about - just internal.

optional_parameters.name: startdate
optional_parameters.description: Defines a start date for your campaign

optional_parameters.name: enddate
optional_parameters.description: Defines an enddate for your campaign

api_list.name: Sign-On for RapidAPI
api_list.description:
In order to use this API properly you need to sign on.
Creates and returns your public key.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://alletips-url-shortener.p.rapidapi.com/rapidsignup/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "alletips-url-shortener.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://alletips-url-shortener.p.rapidapi.com/rapidsignup/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "alletips-url-shortener.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.description: Shortens your url to a more convenient shorter version

optional_parameters.name: domain
optional_parameters.description:
Defines the domain name to be used for the shortening.
Get a list of available domain names via GET /domains/
Default: alle.tips

optional_parameters.name: title
